## X2Go

- Remote Desktop (but for Linux servers)
- Cross platform (clients for Mac, Windows, and Linux)
- Works both ON and OFF campus

## Benefits over SSH

- Desktop Environment (access to graphical tools)
- Simplifies Persistent Processes
